name: Carlos Orozco
profileSummary: Systems engineering, frontend web developer. Angular framework, HTML, CSS, LESS, Sass experience during two years. Angular web apps experience. Appassionate for learning new technologies and team work.

responsabilities: Increase the test coverage of PHP applications in the Cloud Defender product.
Support defects and feature requests of AngularJS and PHP code in the Cloud Defender and Cloud Insight applications.
Develop new software using the SCRUM agile framework.
Web Development of several modules of a web application in AngularJS and RESTful microservices.
Task automation using ROBO task runner.
SIMLess Threat Management: Support fixing defects using Angular framework and sometimes some PHP code.
SIMLess Threat Management: Web Development for feature requests on Angular framework.
SIMLess Threat Management: Support and tracking production releases.

education.title: B.Sc. in System Engineering and Computer Science
